item.title: Installing ProtonVPN using WireGuard on ArchLinux
item.description: How to Set Up ProtonVPN Free with WireGuard on Arch Linux In this guide, you’ll learn how to set up ProtonVPN Free using WireGuard on Arch Linux. We’ll also cover how to disable IPv6 to prevent potential IP leaks. Step 1: Install Required Packages First, install the necessary packages for WireGuard: sudo pacman -S wireguard-tools resolvconf Step 2: Access ProtonVPN Dashboard Log in to your ProtonVPN account via the ProtonVPN dashboard.

item.title: Hello Hugo
item.description: Hello and welcome to my first post. I am writing this to make an announcement that my website is finally using the world’s fastest framework for making website (Hugo). Thank you GO team, Hugo and contributors around the world.
